text: Khamakha Hyderabadi (1929-2017) was an Urdu language poet from Hyderabad in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. He wrote poems and came to Mazahiya Mushairas many times. He wrote in his native Dakhni part of the Urdu language. Most of his poems are humour and satire, which is showing the problems in society by making them look funny. ==Bibliography== He wrote three books: * Harf-e-Mukarrar (A Story Retold) * Ba-Fard-e-Muhal * Kagaz ke Tishey ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Urdu poets Category:People from Hyderabad, India Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:20th- century Indian poets
title: Khamakha Hyderabadi
